lead_paragraph: Because of an ankle injury, David Beckham was limited to some stretching and kicking drills in his first practice yesterday since joining the Los Angeles Galaxy. He is scheduled to make his debut Saturday in an exhibition against Chelsea, but Galaxy Coach Frank Yallop said Beckham was day to day.
